cluster_information.name: Identify
cluster_information.description: This cluster supports an endpoint identification state (e.g., flashing a light), that indicates to an observer (e.g., an installer) which of several nodes and/or endpoints it is.

parameters.name: IdentifyTime
parameters.description: Time in seconds during which the endpoint will identify itself

attributes.name: IdentifyTime
attributes.description: Time in seconds during which the endpoint will identify itself

enum_values.name: Light
enum_values.description: Light output of a lighting product

enum_values.name: Display
enum_values.description: Presentation will be visible on display screen

enum_values.name: Actuator
enum_values.description: Presentation will be conveyed by actuator functionality

enum_values.name: Breathe
enum_values.description: Light is turned on/off over 1 second and repeated 15 times

enum_values.name: Okay
enum_values.description: Colored light turns green for 1 second; non-colored light flashes twice

enum_values.name: ChannelChange
enum_values.description: Colored light turns orange for 8 seconds

enum_values.name: FinishEffect
enum_values.description: Complete the current effect sequence before terminating

enum_values.name: StopEffect
enum_values.description: Terminate the effect as soon as possible
